text: 4.14: Ro 14.9; 1 Ko 15.3-4; 15.12-13; 15.18; 15.23Nza khueŋ khothɨgi, Zisas rimgiap, taagia khavgi, ana taagip zirɨrga. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza vhɨra khueŋ khothɨgi, mba guigira Zisas khothɨgap vhɨzgi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe vhɨra taagi khavgirga. Fhe Bakɨme taagi mbe ndigirim, mbe Zisas phorgɨp anan han naanga.
